problem.question: To prevent a bracelet from sliding off your wrist when it's too loose, you can:
options: Wrap a small rubber band around the clasp to create friction and prevent sliding.
Wrap a small paper clip around the clasp to create friction and prevent sliding.

key_steps: Friction is needed to prevent sliding
Rubber has high coefficient of friction
Paper clip is smooth metal with low friction
Rubber band is flexible and conforms to wrist shape

constraints.description: Material must have high friction coefficient
Solution must be flexible to accommodate wrist movement

logic_requirements: Compares friction properties of rubber vs metal
Explains why rubber provides better grip
